item.title: My First Vipassana Experience
item.description: The journey of it starts with a recommendation from two of my friends. I, being desperate to experience something spiritual and majestic, decided to take on a 10 day Vipasana course. Being an Engineering student from tech related field, it’s quiet essential for you to cope through the old dying syllabus and find yourself some life through the Internet. The rapid outbursts in Physics and Technology like the Neural Networks,researches on the quantum field with startling papers like “Universe shouldn’t exist” made my mind wander a lot beyond my control.
